message: During your follicular phase, focus on protein-rich foods and leafy greens to support energy levels and hormone balance.
Your energy is peaking! This is a great time for high-intensity workouts and trying new fitness challenges.
You've logged cramps on the first 2 days of your period for the last 3 cycles. Consider trying heat therapy or gentle stretching.
Many experience mood shifts during the luteal phase. Practice self-care and don't be too hard on yourself.
Your cycle length has varied by more than 7 days in the last 2 months. Consider consulting with your healthcare provider.
During your period, iron-rich foods like spinach, lentils, and lean meat can help replenish what's lost.
Feeling tired? Light yoga or walking can help reduce cramps and boost your mood during your period.
You've reported feeling energetic during your follicular phase consistently. Your body is responding well to your routine!
